projects.title: AgentSim2: A Large-Scale Agent Town Driven by Large Language Models
projects.description: The second version of AgentSim. A much larger AI town than Stanford one.

projects.title: Generalizing Motion Planners with Mixture of Experts for Autonomous Driving
projects.authors: Main idea provided by Shiduo Zhang.
projects.description: Introduce MoE to autonomous driving, proposed by me. Due to time constraints, I only contributed to the idea and baseline in early discussions.

projects.title: General Intelligent Agent for Computer Usage: A Method to Robotics Process Automation AI.
projects.authors: Shiduo Zhang, Ziwen Zhuang & Hang Zhao
projects.description: A highly forward-thinking and insightful idea!. Using mouse control for general-purpose RPA tasks. Just like Claude's work in October 2024. However, our practice began two years earlier, in a time before GPT.

projects.title: Vision-Guided Quadrupedal Agile Locomotion with Multi-Modal Information Fusion
projects.authors: Shiduo Zhang, Ziwen Zhuang & Hang Zhao
projects.description: One of the earliest projects on locomotion. Concurrent work of Legged Gym.
